headline: How the 19-Year Kazakhstan Air Traffic Modernization Deal Has Changed Leidos Holdings' (LDOS) Investment Story
summary: Earlier this month, Kazaeronavigatsia announced that it has signed a 19-year contract with Leidos Holdings to modernize Kazakhstan's national air traffic control system, including upgrades in four control centers and 21 towers with the advanced SkyLine-X Air Traffic Management platform. This long-term partnership aims to support Kazakhstan’s rapidly expanding aviation sector, which anticipates passenger volumes to rise to 26 million annually and a more than doubling of its civil aircraft...
